titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (RETE TESTIS) - Description

div.p: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (RETE TESTIS) is the same as attribute TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR FOR TESTICULAR, to indicate if the Tumour has invaded the rete testis (network of small tubules found in the part of the testicle) for seminoma only (germ cell Tumour of the testis) during an Urological Cancer Care Spell.
